1.<center>我が 霊廟に仕掛けし謎に挑み|よくぞ ここまで たどり着いた……: How did you manage to get this far, after all|the riddles you've set up in my tomb?

2.<center>扉の先で待つのは 財宝の守護者ぞ……。|さあ 最後の謎を 解き明: Beyond the passage awaits the guardian of the|treasure, now unravel the final riddle and|take possession of the hidden treasure!

3.<center>扉の先で そなたを迎え撃つは|霊廟を護りし 秘宝の使い魔たちの|: The vindictive thoughts of the Famililar of|the Treasure Horror who guarded the tomb will|greet you at the door...

4.<center>さあ 最後の謎を 解き明かし|隠されし財宝を 手に入れてみせよ…: Now, let's solve the last riddle and get our|hands on the hidden treasure...!
